channel.title: [error] i need help with ess miner script
channel.description:
Hey i need help with this sript
name:VARROK ESSENCE MINER VERSION 3.1.1 by : solemn wishes every time i try to run it i get the following error
Line 146: [Error] (13268:1): Unknown identifier 'MouseFindFlag' in script C:\Documents and Settings\Compaq_Owner\My Documents\scar stuff\solemn wishes ess miner.scar
i have followed the setup instructions to the best of my small scripting knowledge. i wouldnt be suprised if im doing something wrong. i am posting lines 142-148 and attaching the whole script.
help would be much appreciated.
also here is the link that i found it at http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,265.0.html
and here is the link to the download page http://www.moparisthebest.org/smf/index.php/topic,29524.0.html
[code] FindNormalRandoms;
If ( FindFight ) then Begin MouseFindFlag ( MMCX, MMY1 + 10, 1, 5 ); Flag; End; [/code]

item.title: [error] i need help with ess miner script
item.dc:creator: @IP-Drowner IP-Drowner
item.description:
@IP-Drowner wrote:

[quote=“1 sk8 kr3w, post:7, topic:220324”]ok i know it seems like i am just having one problem after another
but now as soon as i get to the first flag destination runscpae freezes
everything else is still running it’s not a computer freeze but just the game and the second i stop the script it unfreezes.[/quote]
That’s probably because of too much memory usage inside SCAR.

Nashi:

Sorry Skate Crew, That script is just outdated, Solemn hasn’t been seen around in a while and there are no other Essence Miners, you could try requesting one and hoping someone decides to try it, However there’s no guarantee =/

LIAR! There ARE scripts

Read full topic

item.title: [error] i need help with ess miner script
item.dc:creator: @IP-Drowner IP-Drowner
item.description:
@IP-Drowner wrote:

Hmm, never heard of FindNewBox before. Anyways, i have managed to remove all errors from this script, however i don’t guarentee that you won’t be banned (by the looks of it) or it will work.

I have commented in the script as to what i have changed. Can you make a list of what i have changed please? Anyways, here is the full script:

Read full topic
item.source: [error] i need help with ess miner script

item.title: [error] i need help with ess miner script
item.dc:creator: @1_sk8_kr3w 1 sk8 kr3w
item.description:
@1_sk8_kr3w wrote:

ok so i changed that in the script and
that error no longer exists now i get this error

Line 159: [Error] (13281:1): Unknown identifier ‘findnewbox’ in script C:\Documents and Settings\Compaq_Owner\My Documents\scar stuff\solemn wishes ess miner.scar

here is lines 153-166

procedure walkingrandoms;
var i : integer;
begin

   if(not(loggedin)) then LoginPlayer;
      FindLamp('mining');
      findnewbox;   <================ error

      i:= random(3)+1
          if(i=1)then
               begin;
          FindNormalRandoms;
          antiban;
      end;

what can i change this line of code to?

Read full topic
